Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add mid-test flow and neutral-writing for complete research protocol

Implemented missing mid-test (PANAS) measurement step and neutral-writing page for control group.

**Key Features:**
- Mid-test PANAS measurement after negative-event recall
- Neutral-writing page for C group (control condition)
- Group-based routing: A/Bâ†’intervention, Câ†’neutral-writing
- Progress tracking with automatic resume from last incomplete step
- Complete API integration for all survey steps

**Technical Changes:**
- Created save-mid-test API with UPSERT pattern
- Created save-writing-task API for all writing tasks
- Updated check-progress API to handle UUID/identifier and mid-test flow
- Added RLS policies for mid-test and writing tasks tables
- Implemented participant verification with progress resume

**Research Flow:**
consent â†’ demographics â†’ pre-test â†’ negative-event â†’ **mid-test** â†’ 
[A/B: intervention | C: neutral-writing] â†’ post-test

)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add admin dashboard and fix TypeScript build errors

Implemented comprehensive admin dashboard for research participant management and resolved all TypeScript type errors.

**Key Features:**
- Admin authentication and dashboard interface
- Real-time participant data monitoring with expandable details
- Statistics cards showing total, completed, in-progress, and group distribution
- CSV export functionality for data analysis
- Detailed view of demographics, test scores, writing tasks, and qualitative responses
- Admin API endpoints for participants and intervention data

**Technical Changes:**
- Created admin login page with session-based authentication
- Built admin dashboard with participant table and detailed data views
- Added ParticipantData interface with group_assignment property
- Implemented CSV export with proper encoding (UTF-8 BOM)
- Created API routes for admin data access with authorization
- Added proper TypeScript types to resolve build errors

**UI Improvements:**
- Responsive grid layout for statistics and data cards
- Color-coded status badges and group indicators
- Expandable rows for detailed participant information
- GPT feedback display with token usage metrics
- Interview willingness and payment information display

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
